title: 87/145/EEC: Commission Decision of 13 February 1987 on improving the efficiency of agricultural structures in Italy (Friuli-Venezia Giulia) in accordance with Council Regulation (EEC) No 797/85 (Only the Italian text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 13 February 1987
on improving the efficiency of agricultural structures in Italy (Friuli-Venezia Giulia) in accordance with Council Regulation (EEC) No 797/85
(Only the Italian text is authentic)
(87/145/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The provisions implementing Regulation (EEC) No 797/85 as set out in Friuli-Venezia Giulia Regional Law No 34 of 13 August 1986 and forwarded by the Italian Government on 30 September 1986 satisfy the conditions for a financial contribution from the Community to the common measure provided for in Article 1 of the said Regulation.
This Decision is addressed to the Italian Republic.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 13 February 1987.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 93, 30. 3. 1985, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 194, 17. 7. 1986, p. 4.
